select a.id,c.person_name,d.doc_name,b.doc_org_name org_name,a.service_pack_value pack_value, a.sign_time,a.due_time from t_sign_agreement a left join t_user_doc_sign b on a.sign_id=b.id left join t_person_information c on b.family_id=c.family_id left join t_doctor d on b.doc_team_id = d.team_id where c.master_flag='1' and d.leader_flag='1'
and d.team_id=#{teamId}
and d.org_id=#{orgId}
and b.family_id in( select family_id from t_person_information e left join t_person_desease_info f on e.person_id=f.person_id where 1=1
and hyper_flag='1'
and diabetes_flag='1'
and major_psychosis_flag='1'
and oldm_flag='1'
and maternal_flag='1'
and child_flag='1'
)

select count(*) from t_sign_agreement a left join t_user_doc_sign b on a.sign_id=b.id left join t_person_information c on b.family_id=c.family_id left join t_doctor d on b.doc_team_id = d.team_id where c.master_flag='1' and d.leader_flag='1'
and d.team_id=#{teamId}
and d.org_id=#{orgId}
and b.family_id in( select family_id from t_person_information e left join t_person_desease_info f on e.person_id=f.person_id where 1=1
and hyper_flag='1'
and diabetes_flag='1'
and major_psychosis_flag='1'
and oldm_flag='1'
and maternal_flag='1'
and child_flag='1'
)
